comments.body: Can you add a comment about what this is for?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -31,6 +31,8 @@ import org.apache.spark.util.Utils
 abstract class ParquetCompatibilityTest extends QueryTest with ParquetTest with BeforeAndAfterAll {
   protected var parquetStore: File = _
 
+  protected def stagingDir: Option[String] = None

comments.body: done. Hive now uses a staging subdir (`.hive-staging`) under tables, so work there stays in the same HDFS encryption zone as the data itself...this property ensures that if the path is set, parquet files under it are ignored.
